ygData.subject: PLEASE: Always post Your Bard's Level with Messages
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, all Many great suggestions on different fighting areas, quests and techniques are posted on the list....but I ask that everyone please post there Bard s
ygData.messageBody:
Hello, all

Many great suggestions on different fighting areas, quests and techniques
are posted on the list....but I ask that everyone please post there Bard's
level or at least the avg level of the participating party. I'm having
trouble seeing at what level the suggestions are appropriate. Thanks!



*******************************************************
David A. Nolle <David_Nolle@...>
Parsons Transportation Group
(972) 991-1900
*******************************************************
